casebody.data:
Dwayne E. GRAY, Appellant-Plaintiff,
v.
PPS OF INDIANA, LLC, and State Farm Fire and Casualty Co., Appellees-Defendants. Court of Appeals Case No. 49A02-1712-PL-2799 Court of Appeals of Indiana. FILED September 17, 2018

DISPOSITION OF CASE BY UNPUBLISHED MEMORANDUM DECISION

SHEPARD , Sr.J. Affirmed. NAJAM, J., Concurs.

MATHIAS, J., Concurs.
